wikipedia_page.main: S. J. Goldsmith (Hebrew: שמואל יוסף גולדשמידט; born Shmuel Yosef Goldshmidt; 18 April 1915 – 18 January 1995), also known as Sam Goldsmith, was a journalist, author, and editor in the European Jewish press and English press.

response: * S. J. Goldsmith (1915–1995), journalist and editor
Rajak is the daughter of Lithuanian-English journalist S. J. Goldsmith. She is married to Harry Rajak, Professor Emeritus of Law at the University of Sussex.
